3: The 'Iron Maiden' Tifa lightly trailed out of the darkness, a Construct lay unmoving on one of her spikes.
The Construct was then thrown aside like trash. The body let off a dull thud as it hit the ground, causing a cloud of dust to rise.
Hey! Vera, what's the situation on your end? We just saw a corpse of your squad.
But she had something up her sleeve... Tch!
I'll give you one last piece of advice, this 'maiden' before you isn't of sound mind, beware...
Are you not worried about your squad member?
Just a dead piece of trash. Nothing but himself to blame.
Augh! Al... right, I'll need a little break.
Humanity will never defeat the Punishing Virus. How much more pain do you need to understand this plain simple fact?
Because of your naivety, this hell was unleashed upon us...
And cost me my... most precious... commandant...
But now, I have the power of the Ascension-Network on my side.
And with this power, I will fulfill the last wish of my commandant...
